ValidationRule.description: SHIPPER and CONSIGNEE must be different from each other.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( AND(shipper__c != null, Cnee__c != null, shipper__c = Cnee__c) , true, false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: ShipperとConsigneeは一致してはいけません。ご確認の上、正しく再入力してください。 SHIPPER must be different from CONSIGNEE. Please re-enter the correct data
